column4: This is likely a very newbie question but how do I get access to move a folder in the firefox folder at /etc/firefox/profile? The permissions say only the root is allowed and I assume there is some command I need but sadly I don't know it.
you would use sudo, but whay are you truing to move that folder
An option you can use is to use gksudo nautilus... do what you need to do and exit the program
